Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 6

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
6A Bradfield St George Holly Bush Corner 0920 – 0935
6B Bradfield St Clare Village Hall 0940 – 0955
6C Cockfield Windsor Green 1005 – 1025
6D Cavendish Pentlow Drive 1045 – 1100
6E Cavendish Church 1105 – 1200
6F Cavendish Pumping Station 1205 – 1215
6G Stoke by Clare The Lion 1230 – 1255
6H Wixoe Church 1305 – 1320
6I Stoke by Clare Chapel Street 1425 – 1455
6J Poslingford Shepherd and Dog 1510 – 1530
6K Stansfield Lower Street 1540 – 1600
6L Wickhambrook Clopton Park 1605 – 1625

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2020: 15 January, 12 February, 11 March, 8 April, 6 May, 3 June, 1 July, 29 July, 26 August, 23 September, 21 October, 18 November, 16 December
